DOC.brief_title: Prevalence Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease ( GERD ) Patients With Upper Gastrointestinal Tract Symptoms Egypt

DOC.criteria: 18 year Attending medical office reporting symptom suggestive upper gastrointestinal tract symptom heartburn/regurgitation , abdominal pain , bloating , belch nausea/vomiting . Participating clinical trial last 3 month . Patients able read and/or understand GERDQ questionnaire . Patients already include study participate site . Patients take PPIs H2blockers l
